General.Name: Schwälbchen Molkerei Jakob Berz AG
General.Description: Schwälbchen Molkerei Jakob Berz AG produces and sells milk products in Germany. It offers fresh and long-life milk, yogurt, cream and sour cream products, cottage and layered cheese, and spreads and specialties. The company was founded in 1938 and is based in Bad Schwalbach, Germany.
